attributes.action: Reduce Content or Cancel GCSE and A Level Exams 2022
attributes.additional_details: This Virus has meant students have had to self isolate missing crucial learning time. And now we have been put in National Lockdown it is harder to learn from home. I am requesting that the Government review 2022 exams and make any necessary changes.
attributes.background: Reduce Content or Cancel GCSE and A Level Exams 2022

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petition which call for these actions: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566803
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566760

Exam arrangements and the current coronavirus pandemic can cause worry and stress. You can find information on how to deal with stress here:  

Young Minds: https://youngminds.org.uk 

Children’s Society: https://www.childrenssociety.org.uk/mental-health-advice-for-children-and-young-people/issues-affecting-young-people   

Childline: https://www.childline.org.uk/info-advice/your-feelings/anxiety-stress-panic/coping-with-stress/
